text: wala trjeu fi ehwdkm, fayakun mathalkm mithl aimra'at ghzlt ghazla wahkmth, thuma nqdth, tjelwn 'aymanikum alty hlftmwha eind alteahd khdyet liman eahdtmwh, wtnqdwn ehdkm 'iidha wajadtum jamaeat 'akthar malana wmnfet min aladhin eahdtmwhm, 'iinama ykhtbrkm allah bima 'amrakum bih min alwafa' balehwd wama nahakum eanh min nqdha, wlybyin lakum yawm alqiamat ma kuntum fih takhtalifun fi aldunya min al'iiman biallah wnbwt muhamad salaa allah ealayh wslm
